nodes.text: Goethar Special was a unique swoop bike, a replica of the bike of the legendary swoop champion Goethar Kleej, painted in his signature colors. In 3963 BBY the bike was set to be a prize for the winner of the Tandem Open, set on Jervo's World. Rohlan Dyre eventually won the Tandem Finals and the bike went into his possession, though he didn't know what to do with it and eventually let Zayne Carrick borrow it. Zayne took it to Coruscant with him.
